## Summary

-

<details>
<summary>PR Checklist</summary>

### Initial Study (D+0)

- [ ] Write down an outlined summary of this pull request.

If there are additional tasks that must be completed, write them down.
These tasks must be finished in the blind review stage.

- [ ] ...

### Blind Review (D+3)

- [ ] Read the outlined summary and write down everything you can recall.
- [ ] Identify unclear points and write them down.
- [ ] Review the pull request and ask questions.
- [ ] Read Copilot's review and if there are simple fixes like typos, fix them here.
- [ ] Finish all tasks generated in the initial study stage.
- [ ] Generate flashcard questions but don't write down answers.

### Question Answering (D+7)

- [ ] Recall everything without looking at anything but don't write it down.
- [ ] Answer questions raised during the blind review.
- [ ] Fix major issues raised by Copilot, but don't answer the critical questions.

### Final Review (D+14)

- [ ] Recall everything without looking at anything and write them down.
- [ ] Answer Copilot's critical questions.
- [ ] Answer the flashcard questions generated in the blind review stage.
- [ ] If there are roadmap entries related to this pull request, clear them.

</details>
